channel.title: Promote your bootstrapped software company on the podcast - for free ðŸ˜Ž
channel.description:
Our sponsor [Balsamiq](https://balsamiq.com/) is graciously **donating their airtime to some of our listeners** who might not be able to afford a podcast sponsorship of their own yet.
All the details can be heard in the first few minutes of this episode:
https://bootstrapped.fm/2019/11/15/115-living-abroad-while-bootstrapping-with-craig-hewitt/
There's no catch, but there are only 9 spots available!
If listening to the first few minutes of the podcast is too onerous, [you can also find some info here](https://balsamiq.com/go/bootstrapped/). But really, listen to the podcast episode!
